data.title: It looks like it's successfully opening the port, but not receiving a response when attempting to read information from the device. The most common cause of this is an incorrect baud rate but that wouldn't explain the intermittent success. Just to be sure, can you double check the baud rate configured on the device in SensorConnect - this will be displayed in the device info sidebar on the left side of the screen towards the bottom under Connection. If the specified value is not 115200 you can launch the ROS node with a different baud rate by including the baudrate argument on launch, ex:
